attributes.action: intervene to hitherto cancel the proposed merger of lostock college and stretford high school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: please help us to stop the proposed merger of stretford high and lostock college. the council fails to listen democratically so could you please help us to stop the merger. public opinion is turned firmly against it.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the education department of your local authority.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
